Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 71st overall pick, by Colorado in 2011...
Injured on 5/31/2011 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Colorado to Minnesota on 2/8/2015 (Going to COL: P I. West, P R. Wagner. Going to MIN: 3B A. Russell, SS G. Cecchini, 2B C. Spangenberg)...
Had first career hit on 4/4/2016, off C.c. Sabathia (NYA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/19/2016, off Chris Young (OAK)...
Hit for the cycle against San Diego on 5/30/2017...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Baltimore on 9/18/2017...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Cleveland on 6/4/2018...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago (A) on 5/18/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/12/2021, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2021...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/3/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $5,500,000 per year...
